title: Shiloh Farms Organic Nutritional Yeast Flakes - 4 Ounce Bag - Vegan Protein - A GREAT ADDITION TO YOUR PLANT-BASED DIET!
features: With its pleasantly cheesy flavor and nutty umami flavor, nutritional yeast flakes are a great addition to your plant-based diet!
With its pleasantly cheesy flavor and nutty umami flavor, nutritional yeast flakes are a great addition to your plant-based diet!
As an inactive form of yeast, nutritional yeast does not leaven like baking yeast, but is the perfect seasoning to any snack or entree.
A quick and healthy way to add protein to your diet! Non-GMO | Kosher | Vegan
Sprinkle on popcorn or steamed vegetables for an extra boost of flavor
Add savory flavor to soups and sauces where umami flavor is desired OR use as a non-dairy substitute in your favorite pasta dishes and casseroles.
description: With its pleasantly cheesy flavor and nutty umami flavor, nutritional yeast flakes are a great addition to your plant-based diet!
